note.p: Birth: Peakirk, near Peterborough, Northamptonshire, England (23 January 1719)
Death: Milton, near Peterborough, Northamptonshire (15 January 1790)
Notes: Check that Northamptonshire (given in DNB) is the correct county to put in the place fields - places near Peterborough now in Cambridgeshire.
